64902.en: <pc> poured the Oasis Water into the pot!
64902.ja:
<pc>は　オアシスの水を
ツボの中に　注ぎ込んだ！
64902.zh-Hans:
<pc>把绿洲的水
倒进了壶里。
64902.zh-Hant:
<pc>把綠洲的水倒進
罐子裡。

64903.en: From inside, a voice can be heard...
64903.ja: 中から　声が　聞こえてくる……。

64904.en:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Whew! This is, unmistakably, our Arahaghiro Oasis
Water!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64904.ja:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「うっひょーい！　これは　まぎれもなく
　我がアラハギーロの　オアシスの水じゃ！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64904.ko:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 야호~! 이건 틀림없이
　우리 아라하길로의 오아시스의 물이로군!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64904.zh-Hans:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊哈！这肯定不会错，
就是我们艾拉哈奇罗的绿洲里的水！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64904.zh-Hant:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊哈！這一定不會錯，
是我國艾拉哈奇羅的綠洲水！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64265.en:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>*gulp* *gulp* *gulp*...
I-I can move. I can move, I tell you!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64265.ja:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ゴクゴクゴク……。
　う　動ける。動けそうじゃ！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64265.ko:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 꿀꺽꿀꺽꿀꺽…….
　우, 움직인다. 움직일 수 있겠어!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64265.zh-Hans:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>咕咚咕咚咕咚……
能、能动了，我好像能动了！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64265.zh-Hant:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>咕嘟咕嘟咕嘟……
能、能動了，我好像能動了！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64905.en: Suddenly, a King Kelp emerged from the pot!
64905.ja:
なんと　ツボの中から
わかめ王子が　あらわれた！
64905.ko:
놀랍게도 항아리 안에서
미역 왕자가 나타났다!
64905.zh-Hans:
裙带菜王子
从壶中出现了！
64905.zh-Hant:
裙帶菜王子
從罐子中出現了！

64267.en: <voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Pheeew! I'm revived. Almost turned into kelp chips!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64267.ja:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「……ぷっはー！　生き返ったわーい。
　もう少しで　塩コンブになるところじゃった。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64267.ko:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: ……푸하~! 부활했다~
　하마터면 소금에 절인 다시마가 될 뻔했군.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64267.zh-Hans:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……啊哈！我又活过来了。
差点就成了裙带菜干了。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64267.zh-Hant:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……噗哈──！我活過來啦──
差點就成了鹽漬昆布了。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64268.en:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>The desert was drying me out, so I took refuge in here,
but when I went into the pot to check for water, I
was surprised to find it was empty...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64268.ja:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「砂漠で干からびかけて　ここに避難したんじゃが
　水を求めて　ツボに入ってみたら
　なんと　これまた　からっぽでのう。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64268.ko:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 사막에서 말라 가다가 여기로 몸을 피했는데
　물을 찾으러 항아리에 들어갔더니
　텅텅 비어 있지 뭔가.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64268.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我在沙漠里差点被晒干，于是跑到
这里来避难，为了找水钻进了这个壶里，
但没想到它居然也是空的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64268.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我在沙漠差點被曬成乾，就跑到這裡避難，
然後為了找水鑽進這個罐子裡，
結果沒想到它也是空的。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64269.en:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Furthermore, once I was inside, I couldn't get back
out until now... Good grief, this body is an
inconvenience...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64269.ja:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「しかも　一度　入ったら
　今度は　出れなくなってしもうたんじゃ。
　まったく　この身体は　不便じゃのう……。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64269.ko:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 게다가 들어간 것까진 좋았는데
　이번에는 나올 수가 없게 된 거지.
　나 참, 이 몸은 영 불편하군…….<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64269.zh-Hans:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>而且进去之后我就出不来了。
真是的，这个身体真是太不方便了……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64269.zh-Hant:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>而且進去以後
我就出不來了。
真是的，這個身體實在是太不方便了……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64270.en:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Well anyways, you're an unfamiliar person. What do
they call you?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64270.ja:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「それはそうと　見知らぬ者よ。
　名は　何と申す？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64270.ko:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 그나저나 낯선 이여.
　이름은 무엇인가?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64270.zh-Hans:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>先不说这个了，陌生人，
你叫什么名字？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64270.zh-Hant:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>先不說這個了，陌生人，
你叫什麼名字？<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64271.en:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Hmm, <pc>, eh? I see. Thanks for saving me
on such short notice. For your troubles, take this as
thanks!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64271.ja:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。<pc>か。
　突然の頼み　聞いてくれて助かったぞよ。
　ご苦労じゃったの。これは　礼じゃ！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64271.ko:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: ……흐음. {pc}|hpp(이로,로)군.
　갑작스런 부탁을 들어줘서 고맙네.
　수고가 많았어. 이건 답례일세!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64271.zh-Hans:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……哦。你叫<pc>啊。
你能完成我唐突的委托，真是救了我一命。
辛苦你了，这是谢礼。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64271.zh-Hant:
<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……喔，<pc>是吧。
你完成我唐突的委託，真是救了我一命啊。
辛苦你了，這是謝禮！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

64272.en:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hah, of course! If I can move now, I must return to my
kingdom as soon as possible... I have to return to
Arahaghiro Kingdom!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64272.ja:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「はっ！　動けるようになったのなら
　一刻も早く　我が国に……
　アラハギーロ王国に　帰らねば！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64272.ko:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 아! 움직일 수 있게 되었으니
　한시라도 빨리 우리 나라……
　아라하길로 왕국으로 돌아가야지!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64272.zh-Hans:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊！既然我已经能动了，
那我必须尽快赶回我的国家……
艾拉哈奇罗王国才行！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64272.zh-Hant:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>啊！既然我已經能動了，
那我必須盡快趕回我的國家……
回到艾拉哈奇羅王國才行！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64273.en:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hahahhaa. You probably couldn't tell from my
appearance, but I'm actually Arahaghiro's king.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64273.ja:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ふふっふー。
　ワシ　こう見えて
　アラハギーロの王様なんじゃよ。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64273.ko:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 후후후.
　내가 이래 봬도
　아라하길로의 왕이라네.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64273.zh-Hans:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>呵呵呵。
别看我这副样子，
其实我可是艾拉哈奇罗的国王哦。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64273.zh-Hant:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，
別看我這副樣子，
我可是艾拉哈奇羅的國王呢。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000079.en:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Eh...? That means Arahaghiro is... There's no way
you're... King Moonis?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000079.ja:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「え……？　アラハギーロということは……
　まさか　ムーニス王さま……なのですか？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000079.ko:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 응……? 아라하길로라면……
　설마 무니스 왕……이신가요?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000079.zh-Hans:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>咦……？艾拉哈奇罗的话就表示……
难道您是……穆尼斯王陛下？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000079.zh-Hant:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>咦……？艾拉哈奇羅的話就表示……
難道您是……穆尼斯國王陛下嗎？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000080.en:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Mmm.... That face says... That you doubt me? It's the
truth! There's a reason for this unpleasant,
unwelcome algae...<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000080.ja:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ム……。その顔は……　疑っておるな？
　ホントじゃもん！
　これには　ふかーいワカメ　いや　ワケが……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000080.ko:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 음……? 그 표정…… 날 의심하는 거로군?
　정말이라니까!
　여기에는 미역 줄기만큼 긴 사연이……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000080.zh-Hans:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>唔……看你的表情……是不相信我吗？
是真的啦！
这是有着很深的姻缘，不是，是原因……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000080.zh-Hant:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>唔……看妳的表情……是不相信我嗎？
是真的啦！
這是有著很深的姻緣，不是，是原因的啦……<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000081.en: <voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>...Tsk! I don't have time to talk about such things!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000081.ja:
<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「……っと！
　そんな事を話してる　ヒマはないわ！
<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000081.ko:
<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: ……어이쿠!
　이런 얘기를 할 때가 아니지!
<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000081.zh-Hans:
<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……哎！
我没时间讲那么多！
<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000081.zh-Hant:
<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>……哎！
我沒時間講那麼多啦！
<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000082.en:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I've been absent for too long. I'm worried for my
Arahaghiro! Well then, farewell, everyone!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000082.ja:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>「ずいぶん長く　留守にした。
　我がアラハギーロが　心配じゃ！
　では　さらばじゃ　皆の衆！<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000082.ko:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>: 너무 오래 성을 비웠어.
　내 아라하길로가 걱정되는군!
　그럼 난 이만 가 보겠네!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000082.zh-Hans:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我有很长一段时间不在国内，
很担心我们艾拉哈奇罗啊！
那么再见了，各位。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000082.zh-Hant:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>我有很長一段時間不在國內，
很擔心我國艾拉哈奇羅啊！
那麼再見了，各位。<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000084.en: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Is he the real deal?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000084.ja: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……あれ　ホンモノか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000084.ko: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……저 사람, 진짜로 왕 맞아?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000084.zh-Hans: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……他是国王本人吗？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000084.zh-Hant: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……他是國王本人嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000086.en:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>He certainly acts like the King Moonis I met back then,
but...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000086.ja:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あの性格　確かに　昔　お会いした
　ムーニス王っぽかったけど……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000086.ko:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 성격을 보면 예전에 만난
　무니스 왕이 맞는 것 같은데……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000086.zh-Hans:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>从个性来看，的确跟我以前见过的
穆尼斯王很像……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000086.zh-Hant:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>從個性來看，的確跟我以前見過的
穆尼斯國王很像……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000087.en:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>However, returning to the kingdom in that form,
would cause quite the uproar, wouldn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000087.ja:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「しかし　あの姿で　国に戻っても
　大騒ぎに　なるだけなのでは？<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000087.ko:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 하지만 저런 모습으로 왕국에 돌아가 봤자
　소동만 벌어지지 않을까요?<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000087.zh-Hans:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>可是，他以那副模样回到他的国家，
应该也只会引起大骚动吧？<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000087.zh-Hant:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>可是，他以那副模樣回到他的國家，
應該也只會引起大騷動吧？<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000088.en:
<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Let's go after him!! ...I got a bit of a kick outta his
looks!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000088.ja:
<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「後を追ってみるですッ！！
　……あの姿　ちょっとビンビン
　来ちまいましたよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000088.ko:
<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 쫓아가 보죠!!
　……저 모습을 보니
　뭔가 느낌이 찌르르 옵니다!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000088.zh-Hans:
<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我们跟着他去看看吧！！
……那副模样，
我有点被打动了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000088.zh-Hant:
<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>我們跟著他去看看吧！！
……那副模樣，
讓我有點被打動了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
